price: sínú omi tó gbóná parí. Lẹ́yìn náà, wọn yóò fi wọ́n ko Iná.
arabic: فِي ٱلۡحَمِيمِ ثُمَّ فِي ٱلنَّارِ يُسۡجَرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fī al-ḥamīmi thumma fī al-nāri yus'jarūna
